statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM user_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT email FROM user_preferences WHERE age > 30
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'option A'
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE age <= 25 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'A' AND preference_2 = 'B' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY first_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_preferences WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY user_id LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_preferences WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY email ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT preferences FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 AND username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT u.username, up.theme, up.language FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.user_id < 10 AND up.language IN ('English', 'Spanish');
SELECT u.username, COUNT(up.preference_id) AS total_preferences FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_preferences >= 2;

SELECT user_id, username, country FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT title, category FROM content ORDER BY date_published DESC;
SELECT username, email, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM preferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE preferences.theme = 'dark';
SELECT username, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM content WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY date_published DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_likes FROM content WHERE likes > dislikes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 10;

SELECT user_id, user_name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Female';
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content WHERE type = 'Article';
SELECT theme, language, font_size FROM preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark' AND font_size > 12;
SELECT u.user_name, c.title, h.viewed_date FROM users u JOIN user_history h ON u.user_id = h.user_id JOIN content c ON h.content_id = c.content_id ORDER BY h.viewed_date DESC;
